mainText: I'll never forget the first Apple II+ I ever saw... felt like it wasn't even real... life changing... even though I struggled through some of the less good years and struggled to pay for the gear as it got more expensive, it always came back to that good ol' Apple II+. Won't ever forget your efforts and thank you for them. I trust the rest of the team will keep things going in your absence, but I guess in that way you aren't really gone...
author: Anonymous
